issue.title: [CF 1432] Condition for Mythic Keystone Level
issue.body:
Basic Mythic Keystone level = X w/less/greater/etc variable. Pretty sure this is easily fetchable since stuff like GottaGoFast and AngryKeystones can view it. 


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1432 | Raw

comments.body:
I am currently working on a PR to incorporate this into a future version of TMW, but in the mean time I implemented in TMW_Script_Tools if you want to give it a go. 


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg
